articles.title: European leaders walk tightrope between backing Ukraine and keeping US on board - BBC
articles.description: Europe's leaders are trying to avoid alienating Donald Trump while fighting for Ukrainian sovereignty and future continental stability.
articles.content:
Katya AdlerBBC Europe editor
Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky has met key European allies as he faces US pressure to reach a swift peace deal with Russia.

articles.author: Simon Elegant
articles.title: China’s trade surplus with the world tops $1 trillion, despite tariffs - The Washington Post
articles.description: Chinese exports to the United States continued to crater last month, but the drop was made up by booming sales in Southeast Asia and Europe.
articles.content: Chinas trade surplus with the rest of the world has topped $1 trillion for the first time, news that calls into question the effectiveness of developed countries and especially President Donald Trump… [+71 chars]

articles.author: Iain Todd
articles.title: Snap! Jupiter spacecraft captures brand new image of 3I/ATLAS. Here's why it's got scientists excited - BBC Sky at Night Magazine
articles.description: The European Space Agency's Juice spacecraft has captured an image of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS on its way to visit Jupiter's icy moon.
articles.content:
A brand new image of comet 3I/ATLAS has been captured by a European spacecraft on its way to Jupiter.
3I/ATLAS is an interstellar comet, meaning it originated in another corner of the Galaxy, far be… [+5132 chars]
